events.comment: Feb 12, 2022 - Basic game plays ok, add sound and particle effects next then work on the next scene
First 3 lines set up the camera to follow the Player
Create a random number of asteroids at random locations on the screen
Move the ship around, slower torque on the gamepad gives smoother motion.
Getting Hurt (The bullet is not part of the Everything group)
Screen resolution is 1024 X 768, set in Game Properties/Settings
